description:
When the sky turns red, the moon turns black, and monsters roam the streets, Satsuki Kakeru finds himself involved in a dangerous situation and is transported into a different world. When he meets four others in the same predicament, they band together to survive and to navigate this mysterious new world. But things take a turn for the worse when six shadows appear with the intent of killing Kakeru and his friends.

(Source: Sentai Filmworks)
synonyms: 11eyes -Tsumi to Batsu to Aganai no Shoujo-

tags.name: Super Power
tags.description: Prominently features characters with special abilities that allow them to do what would normally be physically or logically impossible.

tags.name: Yandere
tags.description: Prominently features a character who is obsessively in love with another, to the point of acting deranged or violent.

tags.name: Urban Fantasy
tags.description: Set in a world similar to the real world, but with the existence of magic or other supernatural elements.

tags.name: Gore
tags.description: Prominently features graphic bloodshed and violence.

tags.name: Swordplay
tags.description: Prominently features the use of swords in combat.

tags.name: Ensemble Cast
tags.description: Features a large cast of characters with (almost) equal screen time and importance to the plot.

tags.name: Memory Manipulation
tags.description: Prominently features a character(s) who has had their memories altered.

tags.name: Magic
tags.description: Prominently features magical elements or the use of magic.

tags.name: Revenge
tags.description: Prominently features a character who aims to exact punishment in a resentful or vindictive manner.

tags.name: Tragedy
tags.description: Centers around tragic events and unhappy endings.

tags.name: Witch
tags.description: Prominently features a character who is a witch.

tags.name: Kuudere
tags.description: Prominently features a character who generally retains a cold, blunt and cynical exterior, but once one gets to know them, they have a very warm and loving interior.

tags.name: Survival
tags.description: Centers around the struggle to live in spite of extreme obstacles.

name.native: リゼット・ヴェルトール

node.description:
Asriel is a gothic lolita j-rock duo consisting of 黒瀬 圭亮 (Kurose.Keisuke), composer/art director and KOKOMI, vocals/lyrics. They started out releasing their music in the doujin scene, but have since also had their music used for anime and visual novels.

(Source: last.fm)
Debuted as an art director of [Kurau Phantom Memory](https://anilist.co/anime/483/).
**Iizuka Masanori** is a Japanese character and prop designer, animator, animation supervisor and animation director.

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/nekoseijinn) | [Wiki (jp)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/そ〜とめこういちろう)

Affiliated with [Artland](https://anilist.co/studio/8/).

Initially worked as an animator in the '90s, but then left the industry and worked as a magazine editor at [Yuuichirou Oguro](https://anilist.co/staff/195642/)'s company. Made his return to anime in 2004. He wrote a few scripts in the early '00s, but has since shifted his focus to mainly storyboarding and directing episodes.
